Package index

All functions

compute_topology()
Compute spatial topology and weights for hexagonal smoothing
create_grid()
Create hexagonal or square grids for spatial analysis
extract_raster_data()
Extract raster data for a hex grid using exactextractr
find_hex_cell_size_for_target_cells()
Find optimal hexagonal cell size for target number of cells
get_utm_crs()
Get appropriate UTM CRS for a study area
hex_flat_to_edge() hex_flat_to_circumradius() hex_edge_to_flat() hex_circumradius_to_flat()
Convert between hexagon measurements
smooth_variables()
Apply spatial smoothing to variables using hexagonal grid topology
